content.query:
CREATE SCHEMA silver;
CREATE schema gold;

-------------------
---External Table--
-------------------
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE silver.retail
(
    Transaction_ID INT,
    [Date] DATETIME2,
    Customer_Name VARCHAR(100),
    Product VARCHAR(100),
    Total_Items INT,
    Total_Cost DECIMAL(10,2),
    Payment_Method VARCHAR(100),
    City VARCHAR(100),
    Store_Type VARCHAR(100),
    Discount_Applied VARCHAR(100),
    Customer_Category VARCHAR(100),
    Season VARCHAR(100),
    Promotion VARCHAR(100),
    [Year] INT,
    [Month] INT
) WITH
(
    LOCATION = '/',
    DATA_SOURCE = silver_source,
    FILE_FORMAT = parquet
) ;


SELECT * from silver.retail;
